reviewText: This is a pretty solid basic accounting video.  The box says "Grades 9+" and that is really where this would be appropriate.  If you want something for a professional audience (like an Accounting for Non-Financial Managers class) find something else.  But if your audience is High School/College students this will do well.  The production is pretty cheap as if it were made by some college students, but that doesn't take away too much from its ability to teach the basics.
